description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS  re  118  MOTION for Settlement for final approval and approval of Plan of Allocation  MOTION for Attorney Fees and Expenses and Award to Plaintiff Pursuant to 15 U.S.C. §78u-4(a)(4) filed by   Treasure F inance Holding Corp. For the reasons set forth in this Report and Recommendation, it is respectfully recommended that Plaintiffs Motion for Final Approval of the Class Action Settlement and Approval of the Plan of Allocation and an Award of Attorneys Fees, Costs, and Incentive Award to Plaintiff Goldberg be GRANTED. Objections to this Report and Recommendation are due by 8/27/2021. So Ordered by Magistrate Judge Steven Tiscione on 8/13/2021.  (DeSaro, Matthew)

description: ORDER denying  43   Motion for Partial Summary Judgment; granting  44   Motion for Summary Judgment; granting  56   Motion to Strike. For the reasons set forth in the attached Memorandum and Order, the Court grants Defendants' motion to strike,  denies Plaintiff's motion for partial summary judgment as to his breach of fiduciary duty claim, and grants Defendants' motion for summary judgment as to all of Plaintiff's claims.  The Clerk of Court is directed to close the case. Ordered by Judge Margo K. Brodie on 9/29/2014.  (Prakash, Swati)
